item.title: E02142
item.description: Unused Portable wheeled screening plant, Metso SH 6x20 3 deck screen, heavy duty Delta manufacturing tandem axle chassis, 1.2 mtr under screen conveyor, full galvinised catwalks on 3 sides, rail mounted chute configuration, 30KW electric drive, chassis mounted control panel with extra switchgear and starters for auxiliary conveyors, up to 800 t/ph capacity. Auxillary stockpilling conveyors from 10 - 18 Mtr. long available at extra cost.

item.title: E03000
item.description: New manufactured in 2013 Metso SH 6x20 (3 deck) mobile screening plant c/w 3 units brand new XROK Transporter 4030E stockpilling conveyors. Screen size 20ftx6ft (6.00x1.80mtr). Length stockpile conveyor 40ft (12.00 mtr), belt width 30inch (750mm). Capacity up to 800 t/ph. Heavy duty Delta manufacturing tandem axle chassis, 1.2 mtr under screen conveyor, full galvinised catwalks on 3 sides, rail mounted chute configuration. Chassis mounted control panel with extra switchgear and starters for conveyors.

item.title: E03976
item.description: New and unused Terex-Cedarapids TSH6163-32 screenbox, 3 deck screen box, mounted on floating sub frame, 16ftx5ft, c/w 30kW electric motor and guards. Screenbox is ready for immediate dispatch! Wide range of quarry equipment / mobile conveyors to suit available from stock!

item.title: E04799
item.description: New & unused Xrok Transporter 6036T Mobile tracked stockpiling conveyor belt, powered by Caterpillar C2.2 engine with 49HP (36kW), 18 Mtr length, belt width 900mm, EP400 3 ply conveyor belt, galvanized inner legs, polyurethane belt scraper, remote greasing, hydraulic cylinders for raise and lower, CE marked. Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Machines are available for sale or rent.

item.title: E04873
item.description: Brand new and unused Xrok Transporter 4030E Electric mobile stockpiling conveyor belts. 40ft (12mtr) x 30” (750mm). EP400 3 ply conveyor belt, galvanized inner legs, polyurethane belt scraper, feed boot extension, remote greasing, electric motor (5.5 kW) and gearbox combination unit, radial wheels, CE marked. Up to 200 TPH capacity! Always in stock! Delta Machinery is an authorized distributor for Xrok. Choice between 12mtr (40ft) until 24mtr (80ft), 750mm until 1000mm belts.

item.title: K01718
item.description: Unused factory built 14m x 900mm mobile feed conveyor complete with intergrated feed hopper. c/w single axle trailer. Suitable for feeding cone crusher or screen plant. Belt discharge height in working position 6.75 Mtr, Hopper length 4.0 Mtr, Hopper width 1.9 Mtr.

item.title: K03084
item.description: Brand new and unused Terex-Pegson flywheel to suit 11650⁄11800 crusher, outside diameter 1270mm, inside diameter 190mm, width 405mm, 1x grove + 1x smooth flywheel.

item.title: K03085
item.description: Brand new and unused Terex-Pegson flywheel to suit 11650⁄11800 crusher, outside diameter 1270mm, inside diameter 190mm, width 405mm, 1x grove + 1x smooth flywheel.

item.title: K03095
item.description: New Timken bearing to suit Terex Pegson 1000 cone crusher, part number NP389735-902A1

item.description: New Timken bearing to suit Terex Pegson 1000 cone crusher, part number NP389735-902A1

item.title: K03620
item.description: New manufactured subframe structure for large Jaw Crusher (up to 1200x800 size) including rock box, flywheel guards, safety walkways, laders and handrails, 132kw electric motor complete with adjustment bracket.

item.title: K04095
item.description: New manufactured Finlay 14x5 double deck screenbox. Screensize 14ft x 5ft (4.25mtr x 1.5mtr). c/w 15kW electric motor, meshes fitted on top and bottom screen deck., screen is mounted on a modular subframe structure. Walkways fitted on both sides. Can screen up to 400tph. Chutes, Conveyors, etc. can be supplied at extra cost on request.

item.title: K04398
item.description: Used Sandvik (Svedala) heavy duty vibrating grizzly feeder, 4.2m x 1.1m (14ft x 42”), c/w 2 section step grizzly, invicta electic motors (2), springs. Unit can be supplied with subframe / hopper etc at extra cost if required.

item.title: K04443
item.description: XROK 205S-2 static 2 deck scalping/finishing screen. Screen size 20ft x 5ft (6m x 1.5m). c/w 15kW electric motor (not shown on pictures). Meshes fitted on top and bottom screen deck. Screen is mounted on a heavy duty frame. Can screen up to 600tph in scalping configuration, up to 400tph in final screening configuration. Chutes, Sub frames, Conveyors, etc. can be supplied at extra cost on request.
